# Drone News 48h Brief — November 19, 2025

_Window: last 48 hours; 68 incidents._

## Summary
In the past 48 hours, several significant drone incidents have occurred across various themes, notably smuggling and terrorism. Notable reports emerged from Jordan, where drone smuggling attempts along its western border were thwarted multiple times. Meanwhile, tensions escalated in Ukraine as Russian drone strikes targeted Odesa and led to claims of incursion attempts near Moscow. In Israel, the Defense Forces reported increased drone-related threats from Egypt, intercepting multiple smuggling attempts. Additionally, the NIA in India arrested individuals linked to a planned drone attack reminiscent of Hamas tactics, underscoring the rising global concerns about drone-enabled terrorism. As these incidents unfold, the safety and security dimensions regarding drone use in civilian spaces continue to be at the forefront of discussions, particularly in light of recent technological advancements in drone capabilities.

**By category:** airport: 2 • arrest: 10 • other: 31 • smuggling: 17 • surveillance: 1 • terrorism: 7
**Top queries:** drone smuggling (24), drone arrest (12), drone terrorism (12), drone incident (10), drone prison (4)
